definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: We have fixed assets over several hundred millions and employees 1288.
sentences.chinese: 公司拥有固定资产数亿元，职工1288人。

sentences.english: Be responsible for the management of the hotel estate accounts.
sentences.chinese: 负责饭店固定资产的帐务管理工作。

sentences.english: The company thousands of yuan in fixed assets.
sentences.chinese: 公司固定资产数千万余元。

sentences.english: Other fixed assets for which no depreciation may be calculated for deduction.
sentences.chinese: 其他不得计算折旧扣除的固定资产。

sentences.english: The value of the fixed assets is figured out by dint of the replacement cost method.
sentences.chinese: 最后利用重置成本法确定了固定资产的价值。

sentences.english: The fixed assets of public university are important parts of state-owned fixed assets.
sentences.chinese: 公办高校固定资产是国有资产的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Be responsible for fixed assets management, ensure Capex under control.
sentences.chinese: 负责固定资产管理确保资本性支出得到控制。

sentences.english: Sometimes I do some financing for some good projects with thepledgeofobligation with non-fixed assets.
sentences.chinese: 有时也为好的项目做非固定资产抵押债权融资。

sentences.english: Expenditures incurred on major repair and improvement of the rented fixed assets shall be averagely amortized during the period of leasing.
sentences.chinese: 租入固定资产改良支出应当在租赁期内平均摊销。

sentences.english: However, the over-rapid growth of fixed investments also led to the problem of overheated economy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，固定资产投资增长过快，已经导致经济过热。

sentences.english: The Chinese state sector owns almost two-thirds of all fixed assets in the country.
sentences.chinese: 中国大陆国有行业拥有全国近三分之二的固定资产。

sentences.english: Net Revenue on consumption of each ten thousand Yuan fixed assets B3.
sentences.chinese: 收入净额消耗每万元固定资产b3的。
关于固定资产购建问题。

sentences.english: Fixed-asset investment increased 24 percent in the first nine months.
sentences.chinese: 前9个月固定资产投资增长24个百分点。

sentences.english: Investment in fixed assets enjoyed fast growth with improved investment structure.
sentences.chinese: 固定资产投资增长较快，投资结构有所改善。

sentences.english: Under this underground, the difficulty managed permanent assets is intangibly enlarged.
sentences.chinese: 在此背景下，无形加大了固定资产投资管理的难度。

definition: to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
per book/as recorded in the accounts
to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
